_header: Behold and see o lady free / Quem meruisti portare
Subjects: Virgin Mary, hymns to; hymns, to Virgin Mary
_description: James Ryman, A macaronic carol to the Virgin — nine quatrains (abab) with leonine rhyme in ‘a’ lines, including refrain, ‘Regina celi letare’ plus burden (bb): ‘Stella maris micaris clare / Regina celi letare’

CULEe112.First Lines:
Beholde and see I lady freeQuem meruisti
                    portare…
CULEe112.Last Lines:
…That we may synge without endingRegina celi
                    letare
CULEe112.Editions:
Zupitza,  Julius,
                        ed.  
             “Die Gedichte des Franziskaners Jacob Ryman.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         89 (1892): 167-338: 172-3.
Greene,  Richard Leighton. 
             The Early English Carols.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1935; 2nd ed., rev., Oxford: Clarendon,
            1977: 140; 1977, 189.
